content.query:
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
--- We are just transforming table/view to select only the columns we need

USE woca_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.FamilyMembership') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.FamilyMembership
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.FamilyMembership
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/FamilyMembership',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
--SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_FamilyMembership;
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/FamilyMembership/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_membership_id VARCHAR(50) 15,
        individual VARCHAR(50) 25,
        family VARCHAR(50) 10,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(10) 17,
        family_relationship VARCHAR(20) 4,
        family_relationship_label VARCHAR(20) 5
    ) AS [familyMembership]
GO


 SELECT * FROM silver.FamilyMembership;
